targets.expr: sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Master1", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Master1"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Master1", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Master1"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Master2", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Master2"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Master2", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Master2"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave1", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave1"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave1", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave1"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave2", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave2"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave2", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave2"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave3", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave3"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave3", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave3"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave4", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave4"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave4", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave4"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave5", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave5"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave5", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave5"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave6", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave6"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_PT_Slave6", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_PT_Slave6"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="pmm-server", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="pmm-server"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="pmm-server", mode!="idle", mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="pmm-server"})

alert.name: GN_PT_Master1 MySQL Client Thread Activity alert

panels.description:
**Peak Threads Connected**  is number of peak number of connections MySQL had in the period of time

**Peak Threads Running** is the peak number of threads considered "Running" by MySQL, not Sleeping or Waiting on Table level locks which can be indicative for workload spikes

**Avg Threads Running** is the average number of Threads running over interval which can be indicative of sustained load
panels.title: GN_PT_Master1 MySQL Client Thread Activity
